{'component_name': 'API Core Component', 'description': '

Core Component Structure:

  1. API Layer
  • REST endpoint implementations
  • Request/response handling
  • Input validation
  • Response formatting
  1. Service Layer
  • Business logic implementation
  • Mock data generation
  • Caching logic
  • Performance simulation
  1. Data Access Layer
  • MongoDB interactions
  • Data models and schemas
  • Query optimization
  1. Cross-Cutting Concerns
  • Authentication & Authorization
  • Error handling
  • Logging
  • Performance monitoring

API Endpoints:

  1. User Start Header Info (/user/startheaderinfo)
  • Method: GET
  • Purpose: Initialize user session with device and region information
  1. Navigation Structure (/nav/data)
  • Method: GET
  • Purpose: Retrieve hierarchical navigation structure
  1. Asset Configuration (/apa/asset)
  • Method: GET
  • Purpose: Get device-specific asset configurations
  1. Metadata Configuration (/apa/metadata)
  • Method: GET
  • Purpose: Retrieve content metadata and parameters
', 'framework': None, 'interfaces': '', 'algorithms': '', 'pseudocode': '', 'figma_components': []}
